attributes.action: a legally binding referendum of the nation to remove the present government
attributes.additional_details: The present Labour Government has lost the confidence of the majority of the British people. It is the right of the people of the UK to be able to demand the removal of a government that they feel are failing their best interests though a legallbinding referendum.
attributes.background: To grant a legally binding referendum of the British people to remove the Labour government from power as soon as possible.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
